name: Colpick-jquery-color-picker
tagline: Lightweight jQuery Color Picker plugin with RGB, HSB and HEX fields, several skins and layouts. Usage & examples: http://colpick.com/plugin
body:
colpick Color Picker ==================== colpick is a simple Photoshop-style color picker jQuery plugin. Its interface is familiar for most users and it's also very lightweight loading less than 30 KB to the browser. For instructions and examples see: http://colpick.com/plugin
  • No images! Just a JS and a CSS file
  • Very intuitive Photoshop-like interface
  • Light and dark easy-to-customize CSS3 skins
  • 28 KB total loaded by the browser
  • Works and looks nice even on IE7
  • Extremely easy to implement

Layouts

full:
rgbhex:
hex:
Dual licensed under the MIT and GPL licenses. Based on Stefan Petre's color picker
